name: Picking Up the Pieces
description: With most of the displaced crews returned to the 24th century and the culprits in custody, it falls to a chosen few to pick up the pieces of this disaster and ensure no temporal incursions have been left unaddressed.
rules:
-- Unique Federation and Ferengi Alliance Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using T. Paris, O'Brien, Quark, 2024 Picard, or Displaced crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: T. Paris, O'Brien, Quark, 2024 Picard, or Displaced
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: T'Ana
featured_crew.flavor: The CMO of USS Cerritos. She has a dry wit and terse bedside manner, but is a trusted doctor to the crew.

featured_crew.name: O'Brien
featured_crew.flavor: Trying to find Sisko, Oâ€™Brien, along with Kira, ends up in the late 1960s, encountering a pair of hippies.

action.name: I Think I Know What Happened

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Paris
rewards.flavor: Flight Controller of the U.S.S. Voyager, he was haunted by his past in the Maquis and on the U.S.S. Exeter.

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Ferengi Alliance Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Ferengi Alliance faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

action.name: I Think I Know What Happened

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: T'Ana
rewards.flavor: The CMO of USS Cerritos. She has a dry wit and terse bedside manner, but is a trusted doctor to the crew.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

goals.flavor: Forge a bright future with the Federation.
Finagle your way to profits with the Ferengi Alliance.

screens.text: "Captain, whose transporter patterns did you mess up to get stuck with us on clean-up duty?"
"Chief, you can't seriously be that upset! How often do you get a free trip to another century? Though I am anxious to get back and make sure everything really is all right."
"Oh no, you had it right before. This is a rare opportunity. We'll get home eventually, but just imagine how great the future could be if we...sowed the seeds of opportunity while we were here."

"Quark, I do hope you're not suggesting tampering with the past and violating the Temporal Prime Directive. You may not be Starfleet, but if you want transport back via one of our ships, we'll expect you to play by our rules. And that goes for you as well, Captain."
"Captain, whose transporter patterns did you mess up to get stuck with us on clean-up duty?"
